description:
The investment seeks to track the investment results (before fees and expenses) of the S&P 500® Top 50 Index (the "underlying index").
 The fund generally will invest at least 90% of its total assets in the securities that comprise the underlying index. The index provider compiles, maintains and calculates the underlying index, which includes 50 of the largest capitalization members of the S&P 500® Index. The underlying index's components are weighted by float-adjusted market capitalization. The fund is non-diversified.
